channel.title: Glitch?
channel.description: I was using my noob account playing duel arena and randomly just reported someone using the report abuse. Then when i friendly challenged someone, they person can't attack me, or at least that's what i thought. Since i saw him face me but he didn't attack me. So he said "Reported for glitching" and left using the stairs or the exit thing. I wonder if this works? Sorry but no screenshot... didn't bother to make one unless i'm sure it is a real glitch...
